name: Sanity UI
description:
Sanity UI is an ergonomic Figma & React library for quickly building and prototyping accessible web apps.


The Figma library complements the React library which is available at sanity.io/ui.

  • 20+ UI components
  • 30+ text styles
  • 140+ icons
  • extensive effects & colors palette

  • fully based on Variants and Auto Layout
  • pixel-perfect visuals matching the React library
  • all naming and props matching the React library
  • online documentation
